title: Connect with Customers in a Whole New Way Unit | Salesforce Trailhead

questions.title: 1How can Salesforce help banks identify crucial signals about prospects' financial needs early in the buying journey?

answers.content: A Salesforce can commission market research surveys for banks.
C Custom apps built on Salesforce help recruit prospects for jobs at the bank.
D Salesforce captures and unifies anonymous prospect data from multiple devices and channels.

wrongAnswers.content: B Financial Services Cloud can append data to prospect records.

correctAnswer.content: D Salesforce captures and unifies anonymous prospect data from multiple devices and channels.

questions.title: 2How can Salesforce help banks target potential new customers based on their financial needs?

answers.content: A It can suggest the optimal time to promote financial products and services based on market trends.
B It can use online behavior to identify anonymous prospects who are looking for specific banking products.
C It can help banks develop fresh creative for new campaigns.
D It can recommend products to promote after a disappointing quarterly financial report for the bank.

correctAnswer.content: B It can use online behavior to identify anonymous prospects who are looking for specific banking products.

questions.title: 3When does Rachel first need to visit a Cumulus Bank branch after registering for her checking account?

answers.content: A She visits the bank when she verifies her identity.
B She visits the bank after she fills out an online form with her personally identifiable information.
C She does not need to visit the bank.

wrongAnswers.content: D She visits the bank when she completes registration and needs to fund her new account.

correctAnswer.content: C She does not need to visit the bank.
